snippet.title: Sands of Aura Early Access Trailer - Future Games Show GamesCom 2021
snippet.description: Here's some gameplay from Sands of Aura, the atmospheric dungeon-diver revealed during the Future Games Show at Gamescom. Sands of Aura is coming to Steam early access on October 21, 2021.
